comments.body:
Are you up for replacing:

```
type minionList struct {
    minions       util.StringSet
    lock          sync.Mutex
    nodeResources api.NodeResources
```

with

```
type minionData struct {
  nodeResources api.NodeResources
}
type minionList struct {
  minions map[string]minionData
  lock sync.Mutex
}
```

or something similar?
Having resources per minion seems like the logical next step.
Or do you want to wait for a later PR?

Okay, I see why you want to wait for another PR.  

LGTM

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +50,54 @@	minions       util.StringSet
	lock          sync.Mutex
	nodeResources api.NodeResources
}
